summary: OVERDRIVE LIGHT STARTED TO FLASH AT AROUND 70K MILES, THEN STOPPED.  THEN STARTED AND STOPPED FOR THE NEXT 20K MILES AFTER WHICH MY TRANSMISSION IS LEAKING OIL AND MY MECHANIC TOLD ME THE OVERDRIVE IS BURNT.  I LOOKED ON THE WEB AND FOUND OUT THAT THE MAZDA 626 '95 TRANSMISSION IS POORLY DESIGNED BECAUSE IT DOES NOT PROPERLY COOL THE TRANSMISSION OIL.   *NLM
